page.title: 08Wildlife around Blackridge
page.content: The variety of{wildlife}around Blackridge is good because around there are moors, woods and open spaces. There is a good variety of birds such as Coal tits, Blue tits, Coots and Chiffchaffs. The {burn}that runs by Blackridge has hardly any wildlife because of pollution. The wildlife in and around Blackridge is decreasing because people keep killing them. Some people have a collecion of birds eggs. This is making the{bird {population}in Blackridge decrease. The bird population is also decreasing because their{habitat}is being destroyed by people cutting down trees and by pollution.
